__e: Well, if I answer now, you'll never learn a valuable lesson about trust,
Oh God yes, I did, I swear, I learned a huge, valuable lesson that I will remember for the rest of my life!
I'm sure he's going to learn a valuable lesson.
Did it ever occur to you that we might get some valuable information from them?
This guy is important, and he has valuable information that could help us build a park.
- You tell whoever's in charge - _ that I have valuable information.
Sir, that was a good plan until our precious cargo decided, unfathomably, to flee the nest.
You'd think they'd take better care of a valuable cargo like us.
We gotta be real careful. We're carrying precious cargo on this trip and we don't want no trouble.
You'll hear from us when this is over - if you make it that far - and to dissuade you from wasting valuable time trying to trace, I prepared a scrambled phone.
Take it so that you may have more precious time with your god.
You won't have anything, and I'll have lost valuable time. You want Ted's killer?
